3.15.text:
JASON SILVA: What's up
"Shots of Awe" fans?

4.94.text:
Jason Silva here,
letting you know

6.36.text:
that July is creativity
month here on "Shots of Awe",

9.61.text:
which means that every video we
post will be about creativity.

14.49.text:
It'll be about exploring
that liminal trance states,

17.42.text:
that magical borderland
between dreams and reality,

21.22.text:
that space in which
we connect the dots.

23.72.text:
We'll fall down the rabbit hole,
we'll fall through the looking

30.18.text:
So make sure you
subscribe here on YouTube,

32.94.text: or like my page on Facebook.

35.14.text:
And of course, click on
the link in the description

37.46.text:
to see the playlist
on creativity.
